name: GMTKjam entry- Super Pachinko
description:
This is, unfortunatley, my GMTKJam entry. I had no time this weekend, and so I made this in 2 hours with nearly no planning and a less-than-mastery of Unity. I also do not have a windows computer to test this on, at least not in a timely manner. You have been warned.

CONTROLS:

Position the blue things by clicking and dragging them around the screen. Press space to let go of the ball at the top of the screen. After hitting space, the ball is out of your control. 

All of the art is by Kenney at kenney.nl . They are royalty free.
